sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card class="pb-8">
    <v-card-actions class="d-flex justify-end">
      <v-btn icon @click="closeDialog">
        <v-icon>mdi-close</v-icon>
      </v-btn>
    </v-card-actions>
    <v-card-title class="d-flex justify-center">
      {{ formatDateToJa(clickedDate) }}
    </v-card-title>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-list>
        <v-list-item v-for="event in dayEvents" :key="event.id">
          <v-list-item-content class="pa-0">
            <v-btn
              depressed
              :color="event.color"
              class="white--text justify-start"
            >
              <template v-if="event.timed">{{ event.startTime }}</template>
              {{ event.name }}
            </v-btn>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-card-text>


<!-- カレンダー日付選択からの1日リスト下のプラスボタン機能させたい -->
      <v-row justify="center">
        <v-dialog
          :value="event !== null"
          fullscreen
          hide-overlay
          transition="dialog-bottom-transition"
        >
          <EventFormDialog v-if="event !== null" />
          <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
            <v-btn
              x-small
              fab
              v-bind="attrs"
              v-on="on"
              @click="initEvent"
            >
              <v-icon>mdi-plus</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
          </template>
        </v-dialog>
      </v-row>


  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters, mapActions } from 'vuex';
import { formatDateToJa } from '../../functions/datetime';
import EventFormDialog from '../events/EventFormDialog';

export default {
  name: 'DayEventList',
  components: {
    EventFormDialog,
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters('events', ['dayEvents', 'clickedDate'])
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions('events', ['setClickedDate', 'isEditMode']),
    formatDateToJa,
    showEvent({ nativeEvent, event }) {
      this.setEvent(event);
      nativeEvent.stopPropagation();
    },
    closeDialog() {
      this.setClickedDate(null);
      this.setEditMode(false);
      this.setClickedDate(null);
    },
    initEvent({ date }) {
      if (this.clickedDate !== null) {
        return;
      }
      date = date.replace(/-/g, '/');
      const [start, end] = getDefaultStartAndEnd(date);
      this.setEvent({ name: '', start, end, timed: true });
      this.setEditMode(true);
    },
  },
  initCalendar() {
    this.setCalendar({
      name: '',
      visibility: true
    });
  },
};
</script>
